title: Why is there SO many champions that can build pure tank and still outburst/damage everyone?
body:
It just seems counter productive and in my opinion it is a fatal flaw in the game. You know what champions I'm talking about - there is too many to list. 
Why did the design direction involve so many pure tank builds that still enable so much damage? You get the best of both worlds and games are plagued with champions like this. **What was Riot thinking?**
